pyktx.ktx_pack_astc_quality_levels module

class pyktx.ktx_pack_astc_quality_levels.KtxPackAstcQualityLevels(value)[source]

Bases: IntEnum

Options specifiying ASTC encoding quality levels.

EXHAUSTIVE = 100

Very slow compression.

FAST = 10

Fast compression.

FASTEST = 0

Fastest compression.

MAX = 100

Maximum supported quality level.

MEDIUM = 60

Medium compression.

THOROUGH = 98

Slower compression.
